name: POCO F4 5G
Description: The POCO F4 5G is, simply put, a competitively-priced, do-it-all phone. So, if you were in the market for a high-performance flagship killer that doesn`t burn a hole in your wallet, the F4 is a solid option.

name: Infinix GT 10 pro 5G
Description: The infinix GT 10 Pro 5G is a phone with flagship features and a futuristic transparent design that sets it apart from the competition. Equipped with a powerful chipset, this device is a gaming beast, delivering an exceptional gaming experience with smooth graphics and lightning-fast response times. Its magnificent camera captures stunning photos and videos, ensuring you never miss a moment. Plus, the optimized battery ensures long-lasting usage, making it a top choice for those who demand both style and performance in their smartphone.
